Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Marbella (San Pedro de Alcantara), Globales Cortijo Blanco is convenient to Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus Marina. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Real Club de Golf Guadalmina.

Rooms
Stay in one of 311 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Globales Cortijo Blanco, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Globales Cortijo Blanco, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Marbella (San Pedro de Alcantara), Globales Cortijo Blanco is convenient to Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus Marina. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Real Club de Golf Guadalmina.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Centro Plaza - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Puerto Banus Marina - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Real Club de Golf Guadalmina - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Real Club de Golf Las Brisas - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
La Quinta Golf - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Atalaya Golf and Country Club - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

El Paraiso Golf Club - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi

Flamingos Golf Club - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Fontanilla Beach - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Marbella Marina - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Venus Beach - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Orange Square - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi

The preferred airport for Globales Cortijo Blanco is Malaga (AGP) - 48.4 km / 30.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Cortijo Blanco is Malaga (AGP) - 48.6 km / 30.2 mi.
